message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great value for $120. Would you like to make it yours?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to meet me halfway. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $100, but I think that's my limit. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $105?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $102, but I think that's my limit. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $108? I think that's the best I can do.
I'm getting close to giving up, but I still think I can get a better deal. I'm willing to go up to $106, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm not willing to give up yet, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'll make one more concession. How about we meet at $110? I think that's the best I can do, and it's getting close to my minimum price.
I'm not willing to go any higher than this. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better deal. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $109. If not, I'll buy it from John for $80.
